results.content:
Expanded my knowledge on AWS !! 

One of the simple and crisp course. So far I dont know how the CloudFront and Route53 work together. This course is really helpful if you are not aware of CloudFront distribution and to create domain names. Sai Kiran was little bit slow but the topic is covered with good demo. Highly recommended course for developers or devops engineer who wants to know how the hosting and benefits of CloudFront distribution. S3 static website hosting was also worth!!

results.content: Great course by Sai going over how to deploy a static website to AWS.  He teaches the basics of S3 for website hosting, Cloudfront for caching, and Route53 for DNS management.  Short and sweet!

response.content: Thank you Stanley for the great review
response.content_html: Thank you Stanley for the great review

results.content_html: Great course by Sai going over how to deploy a static website to AWS. He teaches the basics of S3 for website hosting, Cloudfront for caching, and Route53 for DNS management. Short and sweet!

results.content: Nice and concrete explanations, after this course you can understand the basic concepts and how to configure and deploy your.staticpage.com with S3, CloudFront and Route53.

response.content: Thank you for the review Stanley

results.content:
The course was very enlightening. We've been using s3 with cloudfront for several years but have a slightly different configuration.

It would be nice to see why static website hosting was enabled at all. At the end of the video it seemed to not be in use.

Basically I'm going to test your same cloudfront setup and try turning off static website hosting to see if it still works. Also you didn't show the 404 redirect to index.html working on cloudfront. It would be nice if you could cover these in your videos.

response.content:
Hi Pete, thanks for the review. I will definitely try to cover and upload the topics that u mentioned. 
Thanks
Sai
response.content_html:
Hi Pete, thanks for the review. I will definitely try to cover and upload the topics that u mentioned.
Thanks
Sai
